cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.12)
project(ImGui)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

set(IMGUI_LIB_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_library(${IMGUI_LIB_NAME} INTERFACE)
add_library(${IMGUI_LIB_NAME}::${IMGUI_LIB_NAME} ALIAS ${IMGUI_LIB_NAME})

set(IMGUI_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
target_include_directories(
    ${IMGUI_LIB_NAME}
    INTERFACE
    $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${IMGUI_INCLUDE_DIR}>
    $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
)

file(GLOB_RECURSE IMGUI_SOURCE_FILES 
"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cpp"
"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.hpp"
"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.inl"
"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.c"
"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.h"
)

target_sources(${IMGUI_LIB_NAME} INTERFACE ${IMGUI_SOURCE_FILES})

target_sources(${IMGUI_LIB_NAME} INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/examples/imgui_impl_sdl.cpp")

target_compile_definitions(${IMGUI_LIB_NAME} INTERFACE IMGUI_DISABLE_OBSOLETE_FUNCTIONS)
